entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
